name: Forest Elegance
description: A natural forest-inspired theme with deep green colors
author: Generated for zsh_setting project
inspiration: Deep forest with layered green tones creating a calm, natural workspace

design_philosophy.approach: Natural forest layers with harmonious green gradients
design_philosophy.mood: Calm, focused, and connected to nature

usage.background: Deep forest shade for comfortable long coding sessions
usage.primary_text: Fresh forest green for excellent readability
usage.directory_display: Medium forest background with light forest text for clear navigation
usage.git_indicators: Natural color progression showing repository health
usage.prompt_feedback: Bright greens for success, muted tones for errors

accessibility.contrast_ratio: High contrast between dark background and light foreground
accessibility.color_blind_friendly: Uses brightness and saturation differences within green spectrum
accessibility.eye_strain: Deep green background reduces eye fatigue during extended use
accessibility.focus: Monochromatic green palette minimizes visual distractions

dir.description: Light text on medium background - main navigation

vcs_clean.description: Fresh and clean like new growth

time.description: Dark on light for time visibility

forest_layers.canopy: Light forest (#569578) - where sunlight filters through
forest_layers.understory: Medium forest (#275d46) - the main forest body

nature_inspiration.seasonal_metaphor: Eternal spring forest with fresh growth and established trees

installation.iterm2: Import the .itermcolors file via Preferences > Profiles > Colors > Color Presets > Import
installation.powerlevel10k: Copy p10k.zsh to your theme directory and source it in your .zshrc
installation.compatibility: Works with any terminal supporting 256 colors

use_cases.programming: Excellent for long coding sessions with reduced eye strain
use_cases.terminal_work: Clear hierarchy and status indication for system administration
use_cases.git_workflow: Intuitive color coding for version control status
use_cases.general_use: Calming, professional appearance for daily terminal tasks
